sentences.en: A crowd was waiting at the dock to greet them.
sentences.cn: 一群人在码头等着迎接他们。

sentences.en: After a night of drunken revelry they ended up in the dock.
sentences.cn: 一夜醉酒作乐后,他们都出现在被告席上.

sentences.en: He threatens to dock her fee.
sentences.cn: 他威胁要扣掉她的服务费。

sentences.en: He tried to slip past the ticket collector at the dock.
sentences.cn: 他设法从码头上收票人身边溜过去.

sentences.en: He was in the public dock, confessing everything, implicating everybody.
sentences.cn: 他站在被告席上, 什么都招认, 什么人都咬.

sentences.en: Now it was again a green light on a dock.
sentences.cn: 现在它又是码头上的一盏绿灯了.

sentences.en: Six 10000 - ton freighters can berth at this dock.
sentences.cn: 6艘万吨货轮可以同时在这个码头停靠.

sentences.en: The crash happened as the ferry attempted to dock on Staten Island.
sentences.cn: 这次碰撞发生于渡船试图停靠在斯塔滕岛时。

sentences.en: The crew was on the beach while the ship was in dry dock.
sentences.cn: 船停泊在干船坞里时水手们都上岸去了.

sentences.en: The judge looked over to the prisoner in the dock.
sentences.cn: 法官打量了被告席上的犯人.

sentences.en: The truck left the loading dock with hoses still attached.
sentences.cn: 卡车驶离装货月台时塑料水龙带还连在上面。

sentences.en: They spent all their time sitting around the dock and shooting the breeze.
sentences.cn: 他们整天坐在码头一带聊天.

sentences.en: To dock points would be wrong.
We docked at Rangoon the next morning.
sentences.cn: 第二天早晨我们在仰光停靠码头。

sentences.en: We took the children down to the dock to see the ships.
sentences.cn: 我们把孩子领到船坞去看轮船.

sentences.en: We took the children to the dock to see the ships.
sentences.cn: 我们带孩子们到码头去看轮船.

sentences.en: What other ships are in dock here?
sentences.cn: 这儿的码头还有其他什么船只？

words.tran_cn: 船坞使用费；[水运] 码头费；扣除；削减
入港；为…设置船坞（dock的ing形式）
[水运]码头；[船]船坞；被告席；尾巴的骨肉部分

phrases.tran_cn: n. 码头；灌油码头；装货码头

trans.tran_en: a place in a port where ships are loaded, unloaded, or repaired

trans.tran_cn: 停靠码头，（使）在太空对接，扣除
trans.tran_en: if a ship docks, or if the captain docks it, it sails into a dock so that it can unload
if a ship docks, or if the captain docks it, it sails into a dock so that it can unload
if a ship docks, or if the captain docks it, it sails into a dock so that it can unload
